SqlMode.Sql: select owner,key,type,value,descr,reserve from cst_sys_param where type = '00'
select CITY_CODE,CITY_DES from TBL_CITY_CODE order by CITY_CODE
select ROLE_ID,ROLE_NAME,ROLE_TYPE,DESCRIPTION,REC_UPD_OPR,REC_CRT_TS,REC_UPD_TS from tbl_role_inf order by ROLE_ID

Grid.Columns: dateSettlm,brhCode,总行新系统本金,总行新系统手续费,总行旧系统手续费,清算金额总计
